name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Double-walled vacuum insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours or hot for up to 12 hours.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
description: Sleek and compact design with noise-canceling technology for an immersive listening experience.

name: Smartphone Gimbal Stabilizer
description: Capture smooth and professional-looking videos with this 3-axis gimbal stabilizer for smartphones.

name: Portable Solar Charger
description: Charge your devices on the go with this lightweight and durable solar charger, perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: Reusable Silicone Food Storage Bags
description: Eco-friendly alternative to plastic bags, ideal for storing snacks, sandwiches, and leftovers.

name: Adjustable Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomically designed stand with multiple height and angle adjustments to improve posture and reduce neck strain.

name: Electric Toothbrush with UV Sanitizer
description: Advanced toothbrush with UV sanitizer to kill germs and bacteria, promoting oral hygiene.

name: Fitness Tracker Smartwatch
description: Track your workouts, monitor heart rate, and receive notifications with this sleek and waterproof smartwatch.

name: Digital Air Fryer
description: Enjoy crispy and healthy meals with this compact and easy-to-use digital air fryer.

name: Collapsible Travel Backpack
description: Packable backpack with multiple compartments, perfect for traveling or daily commutes.
